This endpoint saves a provided Configuration object to a JSON file and stores it in memory for future reference.

SimulationController - Class in com.example.ticketbooking.controller
This class defines REST API endpoints for managing simulations in a ticket booking system.
SimulationController() - Constructor for class com.example.ticketbooking.controller.SimulationController
 
startSimulation() - Method in class com.example.ticketbooking.controller.SimulationController
This endpoint starts a simulation based on the previously saved Configuration.
startSimulation(Configuration) - Method in class com.example.ticketbooking.service.TicketService
Starts the simulation by creating and starting vendor and customer threads.
stopSimulation() - Method in class com.example.ticketbooking.controller.SimulationController
This endpoint stops the ongoing simulation by calling the `stopSimulation` method of the injected TicketService.
stopSimulation() - Method in class com.example.ticketbooking.service.TicketService
Stops the simulation by interrupting all running threads.
